mapper.insert: insert into line (id, name, originalPrice, salePrice, tradeVolume, satisfaction, mealSign, lineNumber, gobackWay, aheadApply, payWay, lineFeature, costInclude, costUnInclude, ContractPay, remark, telephone, lineImage) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{originalPrice}, #{salePrice}, #{tradeVolume}, #{satisfaction}, #{mealSign}, #{lineNumber}, #{gobackWay}, #{aheadApply}, #{payWay}, #{lineFeature}, #{costInclude}, #{costUnInclude}, #{ContractPay}, #{remark}, #{telephone}, #{lineImage})
insert into line_schedule(id, lineId, day, name, meal, stay, trafic, detail) values(#{id}, #{lineId}, #{day}, #{name}, #{meal}, #{stay}, #{trafic}, #{detail})
mapper.select: select id, name, originalPrice, salePrice, tradeVolume, satisfaction, mealSign, lineNumber, gobackWay, aheadApply, payWay, lineFeature, costInclude, costUnInclude, ContractPay, remark, telephone, lineImage from line order by id desc
mapper.update: update line set name = #{lineName}, originalPrice = #{originalPrice}, salePrice = #{salePrice}, tradeVolume = #{tradeVolume}, satisfaction = #{satisfaction}, mealSign = #{mealSign}, lineNumber = #{lineNumber}, gobackWay = #{gobackWay}, aheadApply = #{aheadApply}, payWay = #{payWay}, lineFeature = #{lineFeature}, costInclude = #{costInclude}, costUnInclude = #{costUnInclude}, ContractPay = #{ContractPay}, remark = #{remark}, telephone = #{telephone}, lineImage =#{lineImage} where id = #{id}
update line_schedule set day = #{day},name = #{name},meal = #{meal},stay = #{stay},trafic = #{trafic},detail = #{detail} where id = #{id}
